text: {"grade": 0, "reasoning": "The criterion requires the candidate to propose an enforcement mechanism that mandates the Structuring of Promotion Panels (requiring that the composition of the decision-making committees reflects the diversity of the workforce or that applications are evaluated using blind panels).
